Topic.Title: Tales of the Black Death - Now released on Mobile.

Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone, 

for the last year, I've been working on an new interactive fiction for mobile, and now the game is finally released on Google Play.

In **Tales of the Black Death** the player follows Baldasar, 
a young Italian boy, as he journeys through Italy in the Middle 
Ages.

**Story**
Hunted by the death of his parents from an unknown illness, 
Baldasar becomes an outcast and finds solace in the companionship
 of a traveling thief. 

Together, they try to survive the unforgiving land populated 
with diseases, bandits and death.

**Some mechanics...**
In addition to managing your health, injuries, malaise and infections, 
the game establishes it’s own morality landscape where the player 
has to make difficult choices.

**Note:**
Each _Moral Choice_ impact the story line 
and how other characters view you. 

**Trailer** : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g9Td0LqmrAE

**The game**  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DoubletonGameStudio.BlackdeathItaly

Feedback is more than welcome!

thank you!
